hb_a1_c_assay_method=(value)

summary: The HbA1C reference method used for this measurement. remarks: The measurement of HbA1c in human blood is most important for the longterm control of the glycaemic state in diabetic patients. There is no internationally agreed assay measurement method. preferred-vocabulary: HbA1C-assay-method value is a HealthVault::WCData::Thing::Types::Codablevalue
